  • rqa.tokens.token

Source code for rqa.tokens.token

[docs]class Token:
    """
    Token (Data Transfer Object)

    Token consists of Tokenizer, Indexer, Embedding and Vocab

    * Kwargs:
        tokenizer: Tokenizer (rqa.tokens.tokenizer.base)
        indexer: TokenIndexer (rqa.tokens.indexer.base)
        embedding_fn: wrapper function of TokenEmbedding (rqa.tokens.embedding.base)
        vocab_config: config dict of Vocab (rqa.tokens.vocaburary)
    """

    def __init__(self, tokenizer=None, indexer=None, embedding_fn=None, vocab_config=None):
        self._tokenizer = tokenizer
        self._indexer = indexer
        self._embedding_fn = embedding_fn
        self._vocab_config = vocab_config

    @property
    def tokenizer(self):
        return self._tokenizer

    @tokenizer.setter
    def tokenizer(self, tokenizer):
        self._tokenizer = tokenizer

    @property
    def indexer(self):
        return self._indexer

    @indexer.setter
    def indexer(self, indexer):
        self._indexer = indexer

    @property
    def embedding_fn(self):
        return self._embedding_fn

    @embedding_fn.setter
    def embedding_fn(self, embedding_fn):
        self._embedding_fn = embedding_fn

    @property
    def vocab_config(self):
        return self._vocab_config

    @vocab_config.setter
    def vocab_config(self, vocab_config):
        self._vocab_config = vocab_config
